mr.robotto.components.data.mesh

Class MrBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.robotto.components.data.mesh.MrBuffer

  • public class MrBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a numerical buffer. Its data is stored in native memory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TARGET_ARRAY_BUFFER
      Target type for VBO
      static int TARGET_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER
      Target type for IBO
      static int USAGE_STATIC_DRAW
      Usage draw type

    • Constructor Detail

      • MrBuffer

        public MrBuffer(int capacity,
        MrDataType dataType,
        int target,
        int usage)
        Creates a new buffer
        Parameters:
        capacity - capacity of this buffer, required to memory initialization
        dataType - Type of data will be stored, usually short or float
        target - Target type for VBO or IBO
        usage - Usage of this buffer, usually it will not change, so STATIC_DRAW is used
